name: Rampart Tactics
description: Get ready for an exciting turn based strategy experience.  Create squads from the eight different character classes and battle against AI opponents in the single player campaign, or challenge other players online via matchmaking.  Customize your warriors with powerful weapon upgrades as you level them up, and equip them with "runes"' that boost their stats and add other buffs.  Watch the epic battles play out in this challenging indie strategy game!
